task_description: Read ~/.config/focus_manager/settings.json and apply UI scale/theme/density
Load projects_meta.json and per-project manifests (.project.json) into memory

Run create/import flows with origin metadata
Prompt for path

task_description: Handle status combobox changes per project and persist to meta
Run git status for selected project via AutoGIT integration and update label/output
Initialize git repo with safe-directory handling and show result
Run AutoGIT commit for focused/selected project with logging and error handling
Call GitHub API to list commits for selected project and populate version list
Reset project to selected commit after confirmation and refresh state
Fetch user repos/branches/default/updated/visibility and fill overview table with caching
Set redacted flag/tags in manifest
Send GitHub PATCH to set repo private/public when redaction toggles
Build QFileSystemModel for focused/selected project and sync list/graph selection
Populate inspector with type/path/size/perms/hidden/modified/status for selected node
Apply rename/permission/hidden toggles and reflect changes in graph/list
Edit tag field and Redacted checkbox
Collect and store network events with protocol/endpoint/project filters
Update graph/timeline/table views and endpoint tree with captured events
Load lists
source_section: and sync with TaskStore for system/project lists

task_description: Create/edit/save/delete tasks with priority/recurrence/due/reminder fields
Handle CSV import/export of tasks per sample format
Set UI scale/theme/density/accent and persist settings state
Load/save collapsible pane states and splitter sizes across sessions
Run background jobs via thread pool with mutation queue to avoid re-entrancy
Reconcile focus marker/mount/UI/manifest and auto-resync when mismatched
Log stability state
source_section: and clean up mounts/watchers on teardown
